trans-unit.source: Create standalone scala applications to run on HDInsight Spark clusters | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Create standalone scala applications to run on HDInsight Spark clusters | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to create a standalone Spark application to run on HDInsight Spark clusters.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to create a standalone Spark application to run on HDInsight Spark clusters.

trans-unit.source: Create a standalone Scala application and to run on HDInsight Spark cluster (Linux)
trans-unit.target: Create a standalone Scala application and to run on HDInsight Spark cluster (Linux)

trans-unit.source: This article provides step-by-step guidance on developing standalone Spark applications written in Scala using IntelliJ IDEA.
trans-unit.target: This article provides step-by-step guidance on developing standalone Spark applications written in Scala using IntelliJ IDEA.

trans-unit.source: The article uses Apache Maven as the build system and start with an existing Maven archetype for Scala provided by IntelliJ IDEA.
trans-unit.target: The article uses Apache Maven as the build system and start with an existing Maven archetype for Scala provided by IntelliJ IDEA.

trans-unit.source: At a high-level, creating a Scala application in IntelliJ IDEA will involve the following steps:
trans-unit.target: At a high-level, creating a Scala application in IntelliJ IDEA will involve the following steps:

trans-unit.source: Use Maven as the build system.
trans-unit.target: Use Maven as the build system.

trans-unit.source: Update Project Object Model (POM) file to resolve Spark module dependencies
trans-unit.target: Update Project Object Model (POM) file to resolve Spark module dependencies

trans-unit.source: Write your application in Scala.
trans-unit.target: Write your application in Scala.

trans-unit.source: Generate a jar file that can be submitted to HDInsight Spark clusters.
trans-unit.target: Generate a jar file that can be submitted to HDInsight Spark clusters.

trans-unit.source: Run the application on Spark cluster using spark-submit.
trans-unit.target: Run the application on Spark cluster using spark-submit.

trans-unit.source: **Prerequisites**
trans-unit.target: **Prerequisites**

trans-unit.source: An Azure subscription.
trans-unit.target: An Azure subscription.

trans-unit.source: See [Get Azure free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).
trans-unit.target: See [Get Azure free trial](https://azure.microsoft.com/documentation/videos/get-azure-free-trial-for-testing-hadoop-in-hdinsight/).

trans-unit.source: An Apache Spark cluster on HDInsight Linux.
trans-unit.target: An Apache Spark cluster on HDInsight Linux.

trans-unit.source: For instructions, see [Create Apache Spark clusters in Azure HDInsight](hdinsight-apache-spark-jupyter-spark-sql.md).
trans-unit.target: For instructions, see [Create Apache Spark clusters in Azure HDInsight](hdinsight-apache-spark-jupyter-spark-sql.md).

trans-unit.source: Oracle Java Development kit.
trans-unit.target: Oracle Java Development kit.

trans-unit.source: You can install it from [here](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html).
trans-unit.target: You can install it from [here](http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk8-downloads-2133151.html).

trans-unit.source: A Java IDE.
trans-unit.target: A Java IDE.

trans-unit.source: This article uses IntelliJ IDEA 15.0.1.
trans-unit.target: This article uses IntelliJ IDEA 15.0.1.

trans-unit.source: You can install it from [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/download/).
trans-unit.target: You can install it from [here](https://www.jetbrains.com/idea/download/).

trans-unit.source: Install Scala plugin for IntelliJ IDEA
trans-unit.target: Install Scala plugin for IntelliJ IDEA

trans-unit.source: If IntelliJ IDEA installation did not not prompt for enabling Scala plugin, launch IntelliJ IDEA and go through the following steps to install the plugin:
trans-unit.target: If IntelliJ IDEA installation did not not prompt for enabling Scala plugin, launch IntelliJ IDEA and go through the following steps to install the plugin:

trans-unit.source: Start IntelliJ IDEA and from welcome screen click **Configure** and then click **Plugins**.
trans-unit.target: Start IntelliJ IDEA and from welcome screen click **Configure** and then click **Plugins**.

trans-unit.source: ![Enable scala plugin](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/enable-scala-plugin.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Enable scala plugin](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/enable-scala-plugin.png)

trans-unit.source: In the next screen, click **Install JetBrains plugin** from the lower left corner.
trans-unit.target: In the next screen, click **Install JetBrains plugin** from the lower left corner.

trans-unit.source: In the **Browse JetBrains Plugins** dialog box that opens, search for Scala and then click **Install**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Browse JetBrains Plugins** dialog box that opens, search for Scala and then click **Install**.

trans-unit.source: ![Install scala plugin](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/install-scala-plugin.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Install scala plugin](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/install-scala-plugin.png)

trans-unit.source: After the plugin installs successfully, click the **Restart IntelliJ IDEA button** to restart the IDE.
trans-unit.target: After the plugin installs successfully, click the **Restart IntelliJ IDEA button** to restart the IDE.

trans-unit.source: Create a standalone Scala project
trans-unit.target: Create a standalone Scala project

trans-unit.source: Launch IntelliJ IDEA and create a new project.
trans-unit.target: Launch IntelliJ IDEA and create a new project.

trans-unit.source: In the new project dialog box, make the following choices, and then click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: In the new project dialog box, make the following choices, and then click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: ![Create Maven project](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/create-maven-project.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Create Maven project](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/create-maven-project.png)

trans-unit.source: Select **Maven** as the project type.
trans-unit.target: Select **Maven** as the project type.

trans-unit.source: Specify a **Project SDK**.
trans-unit.target: Specify a **Project SDK**.

trans-unit.source: Click New and navigate to the Java installation directory, typically `C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_66`.
trans-unit.target: Click New and navigate to the Java installation directory, typically `C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.8.0_66`.

trans-unit.source: Select the **Create from archetype** option.
trans-unit.target: Select the **Create from archetype** option.

trans-unit.source: From the list of archetypes, select **org.scala-tools.archetypes:scala-archetype-simple**.
trans-unit.target: From the list of archetypes, select **org.scala-tools.archetypes:scala-archetype-simple**.

trans-unit.source: This will create the right directory structure and download the required default dependencies to write Scala program.
trans-unit.target: This will create the right directory structure and download the required default dependencies to write Scala program.

trans-unit.source: Provide relevant values for **GroupId**, **ArtifactId**, and **Version**.
trans-unit.target: Provide relevant values for **GroupId**, **ArtifactId**, and **Version**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: In the next dialog box, where you specify Maven home directory and other user settings, accept the defaults and click **Next**.
trans-unit.target: In the next dialog box, where you specify Maven home directory and other user settings, accept the defaults and click **Next**.

trans-unit.source: In the last dialog box, specify a project name and location and then click **Finish**.
trans-unit.target: In the last dialog box, specify a project name and location and then click **Finish**.

trans-unit.source: Delete the **MySpec.Scala** file at **src\test\scala\com\microsoft\spark\example**.
trans-unit.target: Delete the **MySpec.Scala** file at **src\test\scala\com\microsoft\spark\example**.

trans-unit.source: You do not need this for the application.
trans-unit.target: You do not need this for the application.

trans-unit.source: If required, rename the default source and test files.
trans-unit.target: If required, rename the default source and test files.

trans-unit.source: From the left pane in the IntelliJ IDEA, navigate to **src\main\scala\com.microsoft.spark.example**.
trans-unit.target: From the left pane in the IntelliJ IDEA, navigate to **src\main\scala\com.microsoft.spark.example**.

trans-unit.source: Right-click **App.scala**, click **Refactor**, click Rename file, and in the dialog box, provide the new name for the application and then click **Refactor**.
trans-unit.target: Right-click **App.scala**, click **Refactor**, click Rename file, and in the dialog box, provide the new name for the application and then click **Refactor**.

trans-unit.source: ![Rename files](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/rename-scala-files.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Rename files](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/rename-scala-files.png)

trans-unit.source: In the subsequent steps, you will update the pom.xml to define the dependencies for the Spark Scala application.
trans-unit.target: In the subsequent steps, you will update the pom.xml to define the dependencies for the Spark Scala application.

trans-unit.source: For those dependencies to be downloaded and resolved automatically, you must configure Maven accordingly.
trans-unit.target: For those dependencies to be downloaded and resolved automatically, you must configure Maven accordingly.

trans-unit.source: ![Configure Maven for automatic downloads](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/configure-maven.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Configure Maven for automatic downloads](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/configure-maven.png)

trans-unit.source: From the **File** menu, click **Settings**.
trans-unit.target: From the **File** menu, click **Settings**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Settings** dialog box, navigate to **Build, Execution, Deployment** > **Build Tools** > **Maven** > **Importing**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Settings** dialog box, navigate to **Build, Execution, Deployment** > **Build Tools** > **Maven** > **Importing**.

trans-unit.source: Select the option to **Import Maven projects automatically**.
trans-unit.target: Select the option to **Import Maven projects automatically**.

trans-unit.source: Click **Apply**, and then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Apply**, and then click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: Update the Scala source file to include your application code.
trans-unit.target: Update the Scala source file to include your application code.

trans-unit.source: Open and replace the existing sample code with the following code and save the changes.
trans-unit.target: Open and replace the existing sample code with the following code and save the changes.

trans-unit.source: This code reads the data from the HVAC.csv (available on all HDInsight Spark clusters), retrieves the rows that only have one digit in the sixth column, and writes the output to **/HVACOut** under the default storage container for the cluster.
trans-unit.target: This code reads the data from the HVAC.csv (available on all HDInsight Spark clusters), retrieves the rows that only have one digit in the sixth column, and writes the output to **/HVACOut** under the default storage container for the cluster.

trans-unit.source: Update the pom.xml.
trans-unit.target: Update the pom.xml.

trans-unit.source: Within `<project>\<properties>` add the following:
trans-unit.target: Within `<project>\<properties>` add the following:

trans-unit.source: Within `<project>\<dependencies>` add the following:
trans-unit.target: Within `<project>\<dependencies>` add the following:

trans-unit.source: Save changes to pom.xml.
trans-unit.target: Save changes to pom.xml.

trans-unit.source: Create the .jar file.
trans-unit.target: Create the .jar file.

trans-unit.source: IntelliJ IDEA enables creation of JAR as an artifact of a project.
trans-unit.target: IntelliJ IDEA enables creation of JAR as an artifact of a project.

trans-unit.source: Perform the following steps.
trans-unit.target: Perform the following steps.

trans-unit.source: From the **File** menu, click **Project Structure**.
trans-unit.target: From the **File** menu, click **Project Structure**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Project Structure** dialog box, click **Artifacts** and then click the plus symbol.
trans-unit.target: In the **Project Structure** dialog box, click **Artifacts** and then click the plus symbol.

trans-unit.source: From the pop-up dialog box, click **JAR**, and then click **From modules with dependencies**.
trans-unit.target: From the pop-up dialog box, click **JAR**, and then click **From modules with dependencies**.

trans-unit.source: ![Create JAR](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/create-jar-1.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Create JAR](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/create-jar-1.png)

trans-unit.source: In the **Create JAR from Modules** dialog box, click the ellipsis (![ellipsis](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/ellipsis.png) ) against the **Main Class**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Create JAR from Modules** dialog box, click the ellipsis (![ellipsis](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/ellipsis.png) ) against the **Main Class**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Select Main Class** dialog box, select the class that appears by default and then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Select Main Class** dialog box, select the class that appears by default and then click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: ![Create JAR](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/create-jar-2.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Create JAR](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/create-jar-2.png)

trans-unit.source: In the **Create JAR from Modules** dialog box, make sure that the option to **extract to the target JAR** is selected, and then click **OK**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Create JAR from Modules** dialog box, make sure that the option to **extract to the target JAR** is selected, and then click **OK**.

trans-unit.source: This creates a single JAR with all dependencies.
trans-unit.target: This creates a single JAR with all dependencies.

trans-unit.source: ![Create JAR](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/create-jar-3.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Create JAR](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/create-jar-3.png)

trans-unit.source: The output layout tab lists all the jars that are included as part of the Maven project.
trans-unit.target: The output layout tab lists all the jars that are included as part of the Maven project.

trans-unit.source: You can select and delete the ones on which the Scala application has no direct dependency.
trans-unit.target: You can select and delete the ones on which the Scala application has no direct dependency.

trans-unit.source: For the application we are creating here, you can remove all but the last one (**SparkSimpleApp compile output**).
trans-unit.target: For the application we are creating here, you can remove all but the last one (**SparkSimpleApp compile output**).

trans-unit.source: Select the jars to delete and then click the **Delete** icon.
trans-unit.target: Select the jars to delete and then click the **Delete** icon.

trans-unit.source: ![Create JAR](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/delete-output-jars.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Create JAR](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/delete-output-jars.png)

trans-unit.source: Make sure **Build on make** box is selected, which ensures that the jar is created every time the project is built or updated.
trans-unit.target: Make sure **Build on make** box is selected, which ensures that the jar is created every time the project is built or updated.

trans-unit.source: Click **Apply** and then **OK**.
trans-unit.target: Click **Apply** and then **OK**.

trans-unit.source: From the menu bar, click **Build**, and then click **Make Project**.
trans-unit.target: From the menu bar, click **Build**, and then click **Make Project**.

trans-unit.source: You can also click **Build Artifacts** to create the jar.
trans-unit.target: You can also click **Build Artifacts** to create the jar.

trans-unit.source: The output jar is created under **\out\artifacts**.
trans-unit.target: The output jar is created under **\out\artifacts**.

trans-unit.source: ![Create JAR](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/output.png)
trans-unit.target: ![Create JAR](./media/hdinsight-apache-spark-create-standalone-application/output.png)

trans-unit.source: Run the application on the Spark cluster
trans-unit.target: Run the application on the Spark cluster

trans-unit.source: To run the application on the cluster, you must do the following:
trans-unit.target: To run the application on the cluster, you must do the following:

trans-unit.source: **Copy the application jar to the Azure storage blob** associated with the cluster.
trans-unit.target: **Copy the application jar to the Azure storage blob** associated with the cluster.

trans-unit.source: You can use [**AzCopy**](storage/storage-use-azcopy.md), a command line utility, to do so.
trans-unit.target: You can use [**AzCopy**](storage/storage-use-azcopy.md), a command line utility, to do so.

trans-unit.source: There are a lot of other clients as well that you can use to upload data.
trans-unit.target: There are a lot of other clients as well that you can use to upload data.

trans-unit.source: You can find more about them at [Upload data for Hadoop jobs in HDInsight](hdinsight-upload-data.md).
trans-unit.target: You can find more about them at [Upload data for Hadoop jobs in HDInsight](hdinsight-upload-data.md).

trans-unit.source: **Use Livy to submit an application job remotely** to the Spark cluster.
trans-unit.target: **Use Livy to submit an application job remotely** to the Spark cluster.

trans-unit.source: Spark clusters on HDInsight includes Livy that exposes REST endpoints to remotely submit Spark jobs.
trans-unit.target: Spark clusters on HDInsight includes Livy that exposes REST endpoints to remotely submit Spark jobs.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Submit Spark jobs remotely using Livy with Spark clusters on HDInsight](hdinsight-apache-spark-livy-rest-interface.md).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Submit Spark jobs remotely using Livy with Spark clusters on HDInsight](hdinsight-apache-spark-livy-rest-interface.md).

trans-unit.target: [Overview: Apache Spark on Azure HDInsight](hdinsight-apache-spark-overview.md)
